mapper.insert: INSERT INTO second_ropi.SUMMARY_TB (SYMBOL, COUNTRYCODE, SECTORCODE, INDUSTRYCODE, KONAME, ENNAME, CNNAME, KOSUMMARY, ENSUMMARY, CNSUMMARY, JPSUMMARY, TRADUNIT, NATIONCODE, NATIONKONAME, NATIONENNAME, NATIONCNNAME, NATIONJPNAME) VALUES (#{symbol}, #{countrycode}, #{sectorcode}, #{industrycode}, #{koname}, #{enname}, #{cnname}, #{kosummary}, #{ensummary}, #{cnsummary}, #{jpsummary}, #{tradunit}, #{nationcode}, #{nationkoname}, #{nationenname}, #{nationcnname}, #{nationjpname})
